refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If subclassed, Baul will request a list of custom property pages that should appear when a user opens the Properties dialog for a file or folder.

example.title: Baul.PropertyPageProvider Example
example.programlisting:
import hashlib import urllib
from gi.repository import Baul, GObject, Gtk
class ColumnExtension(GObject.GObject, Baul.PropertyPageProvider): def __init__(self): pass
def get_property_pages(self, files): if len(files) != 1: return
file = files[0] if file.get_uri_scheme() != 'file': return
if file.is_directory(): return
filename = urllib.unquote(file.get_uri()[7:])
self.property_label = Gtk.Label('MD5Sum') self.property_label.show()
self.hbox = Gtk.HBox(homogeneous=False, spacing=0) self.hbox.show()
label = Gtk.Label('MD5Sum:') label.show() self.hbox.pack_start(label, False, False, 0)
self.value_label = Gtk.Label() self.hbox.pack_start(self.value_label, False, False, 0)
md5sum = hashlib.md5() with open(filename,'rb') as f: for chunk in iter(lambda: f.read(8192), ''): md5sum.update(chunk) f.close()
self.value_label.set_text(md5sum.hexdigest()) self.value_label.show()
return Baul.PropertyPage(name="BaulPython::md5_sum", label=self.property_label, page=self.hbox),

refsect2.title: Baul.PropertyPageProvider.get_pages
refsect2.para: This function is called by Baul when it wants property page items from the extension. It is called in the main thread before a property page is shown, so it should return quickly.
